title: Silent Roar
description:
This piece is for every woman who refused to be silenced —
who chose her own path even when the world tried to hold her back.
The scars she carries are not from strangers but from those closest to her,
yet she wears them with pride, turning pain into art and wounds into wisdom.

She embraces every scar, every shadow, every storm —
because they made her unbreakable.
Her silence is not weakness; it is power.
She roars without words, and the world listens.

title: Voices In Our Head
description:
We live between silence and chaos. The black voids above and below are the moments of stillness — but inside, the center explodes with unfiltered voices. They clash, overlap, and burst with color: anger, joy, fear, dreams, doubt, hope.

This painting captures the storm of the mind — the endless dialogue within us. Some voices weigh us down, some push us forward. Together, they form the spectrum of being human.

Even when the world is quiet, the voices never stop.
